member.summary: Removes an item from the collection of schedule items in progress.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.DNNScheduling.Scheduler.CoreScheduler.AddToScheduleQueue(DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.ScheduleHistoryItem)

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.DNNScheduling.Scheduler.CoreScheduler.GetScheduleInProgress
member.summary: Gets a copy of the collection of schedule items in progress.
member.returns: Copy of the schedule items currently in progress
member.remarks: This is a snapshot of the collection scheduled items could start or complete at any time

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.DNNScheduling.Scheduler.CoreScheduler.GetScheduleInProgressCount
member.summary: Gets the number of items in the collection of schedule items in progress.
member.remarks: Thread Safe This count is a snapshot and may change at any time

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.DNNScheduling.Scheduler.CoreScheduler.GetScheduleQueue
member.summary: Gets a copy of collection of all schedule items in queue.
member.remarks: Thread Safe The returned collection is a snapshot in time the real ScheduleQueue may change at any time.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Services.Scheduling.DNNScheduling.Scheduler.CoreScheduler.GetScheduleQueueCount

member.remarks: Thread Safe This count is a snapshot and may change at any time
